articles.author: Lee Moran
articles.title: Maj. Michael Haley Hits Back At Donald Trump Slur With Scathing Fact About Animals - Yahoo News
articles.description: Nikki Haley's husband, who is currently deployed to Africa, replied to the former president's questions about his whereabouts with a meme.
articles.content: Maj. Michael Haley, the husband of GOP presidential candidate Nikki Haley, hit back at former President Donald Trumps questioning of his whereabouts with a meme on X, the platform formerly known as T… [+1729 chars]
